app_title: === UBUNTU THANDWANA YA U FHIRISA SISITEME ===

help_description: uubu - Tshishumiswa tsha u fhirisa otomatiki kha Ubuntu/Kubuntu
help_desc_long:
uubu (Update Upgrade Ubuntu) i ita uri u fhirisa ha sisiteme hu ite nga otomatiki.
I fhirisa APT, Snap, Flatpak, i rwela sisiteme na u ṅwedza reboot arali zwo takadza.
help_example_1: # U fhirisa hu tshifhingaho hu fhelelaho
help_example_2: # U fhirisa na snapshot ya Timeshift
help_example_3: # U fhirisa ha mode ya tshihadzo
flag_snapshot: Itani snapshot ya Timeshift sa si u fhirisa
flag_no_snap: Ni songo fhirisa zwiṱirisi zwa Snap
flag_no_flatpak: Ni songo fhirisa zwiṱirisi zwa Flatpak
flag_dist_upgrade: Itani khwiniso ya mutheo wothe (yo katela u bvisa zwikhwama zwa kale)
upgrade: U khou sedza khwiniso dza zwikhwama zwo wanala...
